title: F-09: How to Handle Banned Requests

scenes.title: Handling Banned Requests
scenes.subtitle: F-09 — Foundations
scenes.narration: You know the banned topics. Now let's learn exactly what to do when a fan brings one up.

scenes.heading: The 3-Step Response
points: Step 1: Reject — shut it down immediately
Step 2: Show discomfort — make it clear it's not okay
Step 3: Redirect — move the conversation somewhere safe
scenes.narration: Three steps. Reject, show discomfort, redirect. Step one, reject. Shut it down immediately. Don't hesitate, don't play along, not even a little. Step two, show discomfort. Make it clear this topic makes the model uncomfortable. Step three, redirect. Move the conversation to something safe and positive. Here's an example. A fan says, can we meet up sometime? You reply, aw babe I wish, but I like keeping this our little private space here. I'd rather show you something special right now. See? Reject, show it's not happening, redirect to content.

scenes.heading: What NOT to Do
points: Never play along, not even as a joke
Never use alternate spellings to get around it
Never linger on the topic — move on fast
If the fan keeps pushing → escalate to your Team Leader
scenes.narration: What you must never do. Never play along with a banned topic, not even as a joke. Never use alternate spellings to get around it. Never linger on the subject. Move on fast. And if a fan keeps pushing after you've redirected? Stop trying to handle it yourself. Escalate to your Team Leader immediately. That's what they're there for. Jump on Discord, use your voice, and tell them what's happening. They'll take over.

scenes.title: Foundations Complete!
scenes.subtitle: Next: Take the Foundations Quiz
scenes.narration: Quick check. A fan keeps pushing a banned topic after you've redirected. What do you do? Pause. You escalate to your Team Leader immediately. Don't keep trying to handle it alone. Perfect. You've now completed all nine Foundations lessons. You know what OnlyFans is, how money works, what your role is, and the rules you must never break. Next up, take the Foundations quiz to make sure you've got it all down.
